content: <size=28>Having such a fluffy tail can be quite troublesome...</size>

(Looking up at the sky) Back when I was at the Academia,
I used to observe the stars almost every night.

I've been to many worlds, but everything I saw on Compania

still astonished my mind to its core.

Even the wildest imagination can't compare to a single moment of reality.

(me), have you tried changing outfits?
I once fell in love with a star-themed outfit,
but sadly, they didn't have it in my size.

Though Compania has returned to the sky,
I believe there will surely be another chance to explore.
Nothing can stop a heart that yearns to discover the unknown.

But all the other students who come to stargaze
keep their distance from me.
(Huh?) That's strange, is there something on me?
